backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles with access control, enforcing permissions for viewing and saving profiles. Includes bootstrap admin principal and authorization mixin.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining an old actor type and a no-op migration function.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking specific frontend files and components to an admin troubleshooting UX improvement.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining a warm neutral theme with light and dark mode values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, favicon, and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the main TanStack Router configuration and routes for the app, wrapping everything in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: Admin panel allowing granting or revoking admin access by principal ID with form inputs, alerts, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapAd: Helper component showing bootstrap principal info and backend admin-check errors to assist with initial admin setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/MyPrincipal: Card showing the userâ€™s principal ID with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/BusinessInfoBloc: Component displaying business name, address, and phone using icons and styled UI elements.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Renders the homepage hero section with headline, description, contact bar, and a featured illustration.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Inquir: Provides a client-side inquiry form with validation, simulated submission, and success/error handling.
Displays a list of inquiries with user details, property interest, and message content.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContactBa: Shows a row of contact and social media action buttons in default or compact mode.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with business info, contact details, hours, and a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays the site header with navigation, branding, admin link logic, and a compact contact bar.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the page layout structure with header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/properties/Prope: Shows a property card with images, details, price, and disabled admin edit/delete controls.
Provides a modal form for creating or editing property data, including image uploads and validation.
Image gallery component with navigation, error handling, and fallback UI for missing or failed images.
Renders a grid of PropertyCard components or a no-properties fallback message.
frontend/src/data/siteData.ts: Defines Property interface, business info, social links, and seed property data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminManagement.ts: Provides hooks to list, grant, and revoke admin roles using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: Stub inquiry hook returning empty results until backend support is restored.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth provider and hook for managing login state and identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Simple hook to persist and retrieve values from localStorage with state syncing.
frontend/src/hooks/usePropertyListings.t: Returns static seed property data and identifies all properties as non-custom.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hook to check if the current caller is an admin, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin panel page handling login, admin checks, and displaying inquiries with various loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage setting the title, rendering hero content, business highlights, and a contact section with an inquiry form.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Simple page showing a title and the InquiryForm for users to submit property inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/PropertiesPage.tsx: Displays property listings, handles admin detection, and shows notices about disabled backend property management.
frontend/src/README-content-transfer.md: Guide explaining how to migrate business info, properties, and images from the app to Google Sites.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines local TypeScript interfaces for Property, UserProfile, and Inquiry data structures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing site features, admin issues, and architectural notes for GuptaProperties&Builders.
